Key: Oh, Shido-san... Welcome home...
Hey, Yoshino. You're already home, huh?
Yes.

(Yoshino seems to not be as suntanned anymore.
It was refreshing to see Yoshino like that. She
was adorable...)
Hey, hey, Shido-kuuuun. Are you reminiscing about\nYoshino in her swimsuit? Why don't you see if she\nstill has a tan?

What?! What are you talking about, Yoshinon?!
Of course I'm not going to do that!
...O-Onii-chan. Do you want to see my suntan?

Calm down, Yoshino! Why are you back to being my
cousin!
Oh...! N-No... I guess I'm still confused.

Y-Yeah, I don't blame you. I am, too. Damn it,
Maria. She's caused such a ruckus... Hey, wait!

Come to think of it, I was in the middle of
looking for Maria at school. Did she come
home already?
Um, it seems like she's not here yet.
Hmm. Let's go find her.
Thanks for coming with me, Yoshino.
Oh... It's fine... I'm worried... too.
Yoshino. Now's your chance. Helping him is just\nan excuse to do you-know-what!

Uh... Hehe. Hey, Yoshino, Yoshinon. It's been some
time since we've met Maria... but do you think I'm
doing a good job?
What... do you mean?

Well, I was just wondering if I'm able to find the
answer to Maria's question.
Ohhh you seem to not be as confident as usual.\nWhat's gotten into you, Shido-kun?
Um... Shido-san, I... have faith!
Faith?

Shido-san... You're the type of person that finds
answers... So I have faith... that we'll get
through this, too.
That's right, Shido-kun! Remember the courage\nyou showed when you saved Yoshino.
...Thanks, Yoshino. Yoshinon.

(They're right. This isn't the time to lack
confidence. I gotta do this!)
First, we need to find Maria... Oh, there she is.
So you've found me.

What's the matter, Maria? Did you find something
interesting at school?
...Yes. There was something like that.
What was it?

More importantly... I'm happy that you've come to
look for me.
M-Maria?! What's the matter...?!
Just as I thought. The reaction I expected.
Th-The reaction you expected? What do you mean?

I thought that if I did this, you'd come looking
for me. If you do this in a game, your heart skips
a beat, right?
Maria...

(I knew it. I think Maria is slowly starting to
change.)
Hey, hey～ We're here too, you know～?
Oh... Sorry, Yoshino, Yoshinon.
Golly, how rude. We came looking for you, too.\nRight, Yoshino?

Oh... U-Um yes. Shido-san, Arusu-san...
Let's go home.
Yeah. Let's go home, Maria.
Okay.

(It was a rare moment, but on the way back,
Yoshino took my hand.)
Shido...?
Hm...? Okay...

(Maria slowly walked beside me, and I took her
hand. The three of us began to walk home together.
Maria has truly become part of our family.)

(We continued to hold each others' hands as we
walked home.)
